name: KAIJUCAM: Camera Game Prototype!
description:
CONTROLS:
WASD = MOVE
MOUSE = LOOK
SCROLL WHEEL = ZOOM
CLICK = TAKE PICTURE 
SPACEBAR = JUMP
Q = TOGGLE RAYCAST VISIBILITY
ESCAPE = QUIT

---

Your pictures are saved in the KAIJUCAM>SNAPS folder!

This is a proof-of-concept demo for a game I'd like to flesh out, called KAIJUCAM.

For now, just play around! If you feel like leaving feedback, just let me know if the few mechanics I worked out *feel* good.  

Thank you for stopping by, cheers!
